Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class ClientOffline

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.Client
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.ClientOffline
public class ClientOffline
extends Client
Class ClientOffline is used when the user chose to play offline (only for Single Player modality).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ClientOffline()
    Construct an empty client offline.
